Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 24.0.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 24.0.9-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-cli is earlier than 24.0.9-1, affected by CVE-2022-41717
